title: Integrated STEM Education Design Based on Electric Go-Karts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering and physics knowledge, including understanding of fundamental electrical circuits
context.additional_context: Conduct team-based problem-solving activities in a blended environment combining practice and theory, promoting an integrated understanding of STEM through the construction of an electric go-kart

learning_goals: Understand the operating principles of electric go-karts and design motor control systems
Develop the ability to solve real-world engineering problems collaboratively with team members through Problem-Based Learning (PBL)
Explain the interdisciplinary connections within STEM fields through integrated design of electrical/mechanical systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
